post.author: 허현옥
post.content:
권혁준씨가 재미있는(?) 주제를 가지고 세미나를 준비하셨습니다.

8월 6일 7시
갤러리아 문화센타

Abstract:
The maximum matching algorithm is the first non-trivial polynomial time
algorithm. It was invented by Jack Edmonds,
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Edmonds . First, we will talk about this
algorithm in bipartite graphs. And, then, we will move to non-bipartite
graphs. The key of this transition is that "the flower is shrinkable".

The talk is based on the paper: Jack Edmonds, Paths, Trees, and Flowers,
Canad. J. Math. 17, 449-467 (1965).
post.title: 8월 6일 세미나 - 알고리즘
